segments.text: May I see your boarding pass ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 48C . It's on your left hand side .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please fasten your seat belt , miss .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Also , please place your carry-on luggage either under your seat or in the overhead compartment .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'll put my bag in the overhead compartment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Allow me to give you a hand .
segments.speaker: S1
